column2:
The Greco-Roman religion is the last surviving branch of the ancient Greek and Roman belief systems. A pantheon of gods under the king of the gods, called Zeus or Jupiter, rules both Heaven and Earth. Other main gods are the god of war, called Ares or Mars, the goddes of marriage, called Hera or Juno, the goddess of Widsom, called Athena or Minerva, and the goddess of fire, called Hestia or Vesta. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Can raid neighbors for loot
§Y*§! Can declare Subjugation Wars against all other pagans
§Y*§! The Pontifex Maximus can call Great Holy Wars

The Censor is responsible for taking the census of the realm. While the office was originally instituded for taxation purposes the most important duty of the Censor is to supervise public morality and recommend suitable candidates for public offices.
The aediles are responsible for maintenance of public buildings and regulation of public festivals.
Originally a very powerful office second only to the Dictator, the Magister Equitum, or Master of the Horse, is now a mostly ceremonial, but still prestigeous, military function.
The Flamen Dialis is the high priest of Jupiter.
As wife of the Flamen Dialis, the Flaminica Dialis are entrusted to performs certain religious rituals.
The Flamen Martialis is the high priest of Mars.
As wife of the Flamen Martialis, the Flaminica Martialis are entrusted to performs certain religious rituals.
The Flamen Quirinalis is the high priest of Quirinus.
As wife of the Flamen Quirinalis, the Flaminica Quirinalis are entrusted to performs certain religious rituals.
Did not establish a Greco-Roman state religion
Did not enforce a Greco-Roman state religion
Having long studied the old Greek and Roman classics you are wondering if their religious views wasn't better than your own.
Yes, the old religion was better
No, I'm secure in my faith
If we can return our ancient faith to it's former glory, we can restore the religious institutions of old and claim the title of Pontifex Maximus.

With the restoration of the religious institutions of old, you have the opportunity to re-establish the old imperial state religion once again, but your Christian vasals are not likely to appreciate such a decree.
We must restore the glory of the old faith!
Parts of the Empire will convert to the re-established imperial state religion.\n
Let my vassals choose their own faith.
[From.GetTitledName] has endeavored to restore the ancient faith to the Empire, and demands that you convert.
Without the Flaminica Dialis to assist you in your duties, the ancient religious laws require that you retire.
Without the Flaminica Martialis to assist you in your duties, the ancient religious laws require that you retire.
Without the Flaminica Quirinalis to assist you in your duties, the ancient religious laws require that you retire.
